item.title: Jesse add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "You've seen the sun flatten and take strange shapes just before it sinks in the ocean. Do you have to tell yourself every time that it's an illusion caused by atmospheric dust and light distorted by the sea, or do you simply enjoy the beauty of it?" -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Jesse add a quote by Michel de Montaigne
item.description: "I prefer the company of peasants because they have not been educated sufficiently to reason incorrectly." -- Michel de Montaigne

item.title: Jesse add a quote by William Butler Yeats
Jesse add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The world was my oyster but I used the wrong fork." -- Oscar Wilde
